_sText:
A remake of the much loved gg_aim_shotty. i made this remake for my clan and my leader because she loves this map so much
umm thanks to silent for the original map

What i edited
-Rails( i remade the rails so they were square and even)
-Crates( Change the size of some crates to make them exactly square)
-Positioning( Crates up top where not centered on the platform so i centered them)
-Under( you can now enter under top for a quick rush to the opposite spawn)
-Edited the outer walls so the map is now more square
-Moved objects and section of the map so that they exactly in the middle( The main Platform in front of spawn was closer to CT spawn then it was to T spawn

Map Created by SGT. Sour from Maniacs In Action, Australia's Best and Most fun clan alive today
